casebody.data:
Michael Anthony SAPPINGTON and Angela Sappington, Plaintiffs,
v.
John SHOEMAKE and TST Expedited Services, Inc., Defendants,
and
Cherokee Insurance Company, Defendant-Appellant,
and
State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158823
COA: 337994 Supreme Court of Michigan. February 22, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply submitted on or before February 19, 2019, is accepted as timely filed.
